ir.ac.aut

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.ac.aut.Block

  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    this class holds information about each block of the board

      • notch

        public void notch(boolean isClockWise)
        method for doing the rotations of this block
        Parameters:
        isClockWise - if true then the rotation will be clock-wise and if its false the roattion will be counter clock-wise

        public MarbleHouse getMarbleHouse(int y,
                                  int x)

      • hasClockWiseSymmetry

        public boolean hasClockWiseSymmetry()
        this method should evaluate if this block has hasClockWiseSymmetry
        Returns:
        if has hasClockWiseSymmetry return will be true if not the return will be false

      • hasCounterClockWiseSymmetry

        public boolean hasCounterClockWiseSymmetry()
        this method should evaluate if this block has hasCounterClockWiseSymmetry
        Returns:
        if has hasCounterClockWiseSymmetry return will be true if not the return will be false

      • marblesStrategy

        public int marblesStrategy(ir.ac.aut.TYPE typeOfPlayer)
        this method should search the block and give points to each of the players, the ai and the opponent
        Parameters:
        typeOfPlayer - the TYPE of the aiPlayer
        Returns:
        the points given to aiPlayer having in counter the points of the opponent
